column2: Thanks for the excellent and comprehensive review! As an Elite Yelper
column3: your opinion matters a lot to us
column4: so thank you for taking the time and for the kind words. We do understand we have a few space limitations
column5: and with hindsight being 20/20 we would have definitely altered some of the layout. But in the coming months
column6: we'll be opening two more JINYA locations in the greater Houston area
column7: both of which will be much larger in size than JINYA-Midtown. Thanks again
column8: and we look forward to serving you again in the future!
